p.span: Updates the shape for one or more concepts in a context and all its classes. The updated shape(s) will retain the same min and max points of the original shape.

xsvUpdateConceptShape conceptName[,conceptName]+ FROM Context [IN container] [SCOPED scope] [APP app] WITH shape=(pi|trapezoid|triangle|curveincrease|curvedescrease|linearincrease|lineardecrease) [; shape=(pi|trapezoid|triangle|curveincrease|curvedescrease|linearincrease|lineardecrease) ]*
| xsvUpdateConceptShape "low,medium,high" FROM Height IN Height APP search SCOPED search WITH shape="lineardecrease;trapezoid;linearincrease"
Update the concepts (low,medium,high) from context Height in container Height within the Search application to the shapes linearincrease, trapezoid, and linearincrease respectively.
The application where the context container is stored.
The name of the respective concept.
The container the context is stored within.
Where to save the context (private, app, or application name). This defaults to app.
The shape of the respective concept.
The concept(s) updated by xsvUpdateConcept are displayed in table or chart format. See xsDisplayConcept for details about display of a created Concept.
